name: Funny Bunny: Adventures
description: Nice looking and fun game, that develops logical thinking and responsivity. It is highly recommended for children!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 8600GT, ATI Radeon 2400, Intel HD4000 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 560 GTX, ATI Radeon HD 6870 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Recommended
